Pegasus website

Cornelis G.A. Kolbach, November, 21, 2008

Pegasus is one of the proprietary brands of The Home Depot USA. Cornelis was hired to lead, consult and design UID Consultancy for its dedicated product web site.

This highly successful website was awarded with an Interactive Media Award.

Watch the interactive mockup of this website.

This highly successful website was awarded with an Interactive Media Award.
